column4: The device In the Gateway CX210X That I can't get to work properly is the "EZ Pad Pointing Device" Any one know if there's a forum or anything that's actually likey to HELP?
my suggestion is ubuntuforums.org -- search the laptop  section, and if there's nothing good, then post.
have you tried launching any of these players from the command line, and seeing if there's an error message?
i'm clueless, sorry. surely someone else isnt tho. <sits back and waits for those people to speak>
